articles.title: A Fossilised Forest Creates a Picture of Our Ancient World - The Wire Science
articles.description: This petrified forest, El Bosque Perificado Piedra Chamana, is the first fossil forest from the South American tropics to be studied in detail.
articles.content:
With the evidence uncovered by paleontologists, an artist sketched El Bosque Petrificado Piedra Chamana as it might have looked long before humans. Photo: Mariah Slovacek/NPS-GIP

articles.title: G-7 leaders try to signal that page has turned on Trump era - The Washington Post
articles.description: Rich democracies meeting in Britain sought to send a message Friday that they were back in business after a surge in vaccinations and the exit of a disruptive American president.
